name: Mini Civs
description:
Tired of endless waiting on upgrade countdown? Try Mini Civs! Merge to level up units and buildings, instant complete! Multiple civilizations and eras to explore and experience. Merge, upgrade, battle and conquer!

*FEATURES*

-Merge to Level Up
No more hours of waiting on countdowns, here every upgrade happens immediately! Just merge two same units and create a higher level one at once. This is the kind of easy fun you've been looking for!

-Multiple Civilizations & Eras
Legendary heroes from various civilizations will take you through several eras from history to future. It's where time and space meet. Characteristic architects and well-known heroes await!

-Simple yet Strategic
With only simple drags and taps, you can build up extraordinary armies and conquer this world. The tactical arrangements of Soldiers, Siege Engines and Air Forces are all at your hand.

-Various Gameplays
Defeat enemies who took up your land to reclaim your territory. Eliminate monsters to get rare resources and become more powerful. Attack other alliances to conquer and be the king!

-Enjoy with friends
Create or join an alliance and play with your friends. Help each other with the construction of HQ. Rally and defeat strong monsters together. March out to the turrets, the fortress and the capital bring honor to the whole alliance!

Mini civilizations, simple merge, huge fun, infinite possibilities. Commander, come on now and have fun in Mini Civs!
